title: Tribal looking modern San Serif (as see in GQ)
content:
Fred Woodward is one of my favorite designers. Every issue is a lesson in typography and they take some nice  
risks with their font choices. The font attached is from the latest April 2014 issue.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072806im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AdobePhotoshopExpress_2014_03_30_13:43:34_4002.jpg)

Font: 

 Euclid Flex

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072806/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: helvetica bold
